name: JsonWebKey
description: A JSON object that represents a cryptographic key. The members of the object represent properties of the key, including its value.

properties.name: JsonWebKey
properties.short: A JSON object that represents a cryptographic key.
properties.definition: A JSON object that represents a cryptographic key. The members of the object represent properties of the key, including its value.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: active
properties.definition: Whether this key is in active use.

properties.name: alg
properties.definition: The specific cryptographic algorithm used with the key.

properties.name: kty
properties.definition: The family of cryptographic algorithms used with the key.

properties.name: use
properties.definition: How the key was meant to be used; sig represents the signature.

properties.name: key_ops
properties.definition: The operation(s) for which the key is intended to be used.

properties.name: x5c
properties.definition: The x.509 certificate chain. The first entry in the array is the certificate to use for token verification; the other certificates can be used to verify this first certificate.

properties.name: n
properties.definition: The modulus for the RSA public key.

properties.name: e
properties.definition: The exponent for the RSA public key.

properties.name: kid
properties.definition: The unique identifier for the key.

properties.name: x5t
properties.definition: The thumbprint of the x.509 cert (SHA-1 thumbprint).

properties.name: d
properties.definition: The exponent for the RSA private key.

properties.name: p
properties.definition: The first prime factor.

properties.name: q
properties.definition: The second prime factor.

properties.name: dp
properties.definition: The first factor CRT exponent.

properties.name: dq
properties.definition: The second factor CRT exponent.

properties.name: qi
properties.definition: The first CRT coefficient.
